full_summary:
=================
**Title:** Request for Proposal: Professional Engineering Support Services for CH148 WSM-SPO

**Reference Number:** cb-7448-84936135

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement

**Publication Date:** July 21, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** August 9, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2024-01/A

**Contracting Authority:**
Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2

**Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of two (2) 5.3 Intermediate Engineering Graduates to provide technical support in various areas, including technical focus groups, research and analysis, reporting and recommendation, presentation-making, and expert advice and guidance. This requirement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who meet the specified security level and have the required qualifications.

**Notice:**

This Request for Proposal is issued under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply, which is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers interested in becoming qualified Supply Arrangement Holders should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA for more information.

**Associated Documents:**

The Request for Proposal documents will be emailed directly to the invited Supply Arrangement Holders. Bidders are advised that the documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).

**Estimated Level of Effort:**

The estimated level of effort for the initial contract period is 240 hours per resource. The estimated level of effort for the option periods is 240 hours per year, should the Department of National Defence decide to exercise the option.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
